name: Perl IRC Robot (PIRO)
short_description: Perl bot with dynamically loaded modules.  Incredibly stable, and very versatile.  Dynamic modules, AI-type user commands, Chanserv-remniscent powers, channel-specific access lists AND global users, with some mis. commands.
